value.name: Utah officers found legally justified in shooting teen who lunged with knife
value.description: OREM — Two Orem police officers who fatally shot a 17-year-old boy who allegedly lunged at them with a knife in October were legally justified in the shooting, according to the Utah County Attorney.

value.name: ICYMI: 10 stories from the weekend
